name: Push and Pull (mastermagpie)
description:
Help Push and Pull work together to progress through the puzzle rooms! Push can push and Pull can... well, you get the idea.

A simple prototype for an idea I had a while ago! Originally designed for mobile, this is a quick conversion with keyboard and controller support. (Works best with controller!)

Instructions

Complete the puzzles by getting the crate to the green circle marker!

To grab the crate, move the character into it.

Controls

KEYBOARD:
WASD: Move
Space: Switch Character
O: Previous Level
P: Next level

R: Reset

CONTROLLER:
D-pad: Move
A: Switch Character
LB: Previous Level
RB: Next level
Y: Reset
